original: Naganthañceva naaganthaniyañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nagantho ceva naaganthaniyo ca dhammo
analyzed: na gantham ca iva na a ganthaniyam ca dhammam paṭicca na ganthaḥ ca iva na a ganthaniyaḥ ca dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthañceva naaganthaniyañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naaganthaniyo
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na gantham ca iva na a ganthaniyam ca dhammam paṭicca na a ganthaniyaḥ

original: ceva nano ca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthañceva naaganthaniyañca
analyzed: ca iva na no ca ganthaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na ganthañca iva na a ganthaniyañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nagantho ceva naaganthaniyo ca naaganthaniyo ceva nano ca gantho
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na ganthaḥ ca iva na a ganthaniyaḥ ca na a ganthaniyaḥ ca iva na no ca gantho

original: Naaganthaniyañceva nano ca ganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaganthaniyo ceva nanogantho
analyzed: na a ganthaniyam ca iva na no ca gantham dhammam paṭicca na a ganthaniyaḥ ca iva na no gantho

original: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaganthaniyañceva nano ca ganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na a ganthaniyam ca iva na no ca gantham dhammam paṭicca

original: nagantho ceva naaganthaniyo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaganthaniyañceva nano
analyzed: na ganthaḥ ca iva na a ganthaniyaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na a ganthaniyam ca iva na no

original: ca ganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nagantho ceva naaganthaniyo ca naaganthaniyo ceva nano
analyzed: ca gantham dhammam paṭicca na ganthaḥ ca iva na a ganthaniyaḥ ca na a ganthaniyaḥ ca iva na no

original: ca gantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca gantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naganthañceva naaganthaniyañca naaganthaniyañceva nano ca ganthañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nagantho ceva naaganthaniyo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na gantham ca iva na a ganthaniyam ca na a ganthaniyam ca iva na no ca gantham ca dhammam paṭicca na ganthaḥ ca iva na a ganthaniyaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha vitthāro
